tag_list: social-media, marketing, business, investing, entrepreneur, ceo, founder, beverly-hills, the-brainchild-group, seo, search-engine-optimization, consulting
overview: Aaron Schoenberger is Founder of The Brainchild Group – a boutique Internet mrketing agency that specializes in Social Media Marketing and Search Engine Optimization (SEO) for high profile brands throughout the world. He’s known for his organic, reactive, social approach to marketing, which has propelled his name to the top. Past clients include top restaurants, professional athletes, celebrities, automotive manufacturers, educational institutions, Fortune 500 companies and mom-and-pop shops.
